mapper.select: SELECT u.id as userId, u.name as username, u.img as userImg, mobile, hnumber as historyNumber, pwd, address, zcode, w.img as wImg, w.name as wName, account FROM `user` u join wlogin w on u.wloginid = w.id
mapper.insert: insert into `user`(name, img, mobile, hnumber, pwd, address, zcode) values (#{username},#{userImg},#{mobile},#{historyNumber},#{pwd},#{address},#{zcode})
